description:
Misuzu Sonokata is still against Chuta joining ēlDLIVE, despite him proving himself by catching a space criminal. While Sonokata is begrudgingly giving Chuta a tour of the bureau, a dangerous criminal escapes and heads to Earth. They quickly go to Earth to capture him, and...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: スーパー・クール・スペース・ガール
